content.text: (FB 847) Resolved an issue where filtering the Top Findings Chart and the Vulnerabilities Details turns all of the colors grey. RMK now displays proper colors in a  new table view that is accessed from a drop down list.
(FB 851) Resolved an issue where Icons were missing from the Asset Sub-Tables. Icons now display with the updated table view.
(FB 850) Resolved an issue where ACAS invalid Asset had a 'not required' status. RMK now displays an 'unknown OS' status where appropriate.
(FB 853) Resolved an issue where the Assets Detailed page where Sub-Table events included parent nodes. RMK now correctly counts the child asset findings.
(FB 854) Resolved an issue where the Top Findings Chart on an Enclave Reference Page did not display assets. RMK has updated JavaScript and assets are displaying properly.
(FB 856) Resolved an Issue where the Vulnerability Sub-Table did not scroll to fit the list size. The Vulnerability Sub-Table now populates and displays properly.
(FB 857) Resolved problem with vulnerabilities page taking 10 seconds to load. The RMK Vulnerabilities page now loads much faster.
(FB 859) Resolved an issue where no items where listed if scrollbar was dragged to the bottom (/enclaves/assets page). RMK now loads assets without the need for active scrolling.
